includedAssets.title: Rain Drops Keep Falling On My Head

includedAssets.synopsis: Season two premiere. Meredith and Cristina exchange relationship woes and the Chief appoints George as his hospital spy.

includedAssets.title: Enough Is Enough
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep2 - Enough Is Enough

includedAssets.title: Make Me Lose Control
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep3 - Make Me Lose Control
includedAssets.synopsis: Family secrets become public when Meredith's mother is brought to Seattle Grace for surgery. Frightening news about Cristina's health is revealed.

includedAssets.title: Deny, Deny, Deny
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep4 - Deny, Deny, Deny
includedAssets.synopsis: Meredith's mother has the hospital staff running in circles, while Addison's involvement in the case of a cystic fibrosis patient could delay her departure.

includedAssets.title: Bring The Pain
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep5 - Bring The Pain
includedAssets.synopsis: Meredith and Derek have to use more than medicine when a young woman's religious father forbids her to have a life-saving operation.

includedAssets.title: Into You Like A Train
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep6 - Into You Like A Train
includedAssets.synopsis: A train crash brings several seriously injured patients to the hospital, providing a distraction for Meredith as she awaits Derek's final decision.

includedAssets.title: Something To Talk About
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep7 - Something To Talk About
includedAssets.synopsis: A male patient who seems to have a hysterical pregnancy fascinates the staff. Alex is inspired to better express his feelings for Izzie.

includedAssets.title: Let It Be
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep8 - Let It Be
includedAssets.synopsis: Derek and Addison's professional relationship is challenged when their close friends come to Seattle Grace seeking radical surgery to avoid breast and ovarian cancer.

includedAssets.title: Thanks For The Memories
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep9 - Thanks For The Memories
includedAssets.synopsis: The Thanksgiving holiday is more difficult for the interns and residents than any of them is willing to admit, as Izzie plans a big dinner for everybody.

includedAssets.title: Season 2

includedIn.title: Grey’s Anatomy
includedIn.synopsis: The surgical interns, residents and attendings of Seattle Grace Hospital juggle increasingly complicated procedures and personal lives, while learning what it means to be a good doctor.
